New York City is preparing for icy conditions and potential winter storms as temperatures fluctuate, while also addressing public safety with new gun seller regulations and ongoing challenges like homelessness and violent crime.

### Risks & Alerts

- Freezing rain and ice threaten North Jersey and Hudson Valley; NYC expected to receive mostly rain. - 100+ manhole fires reported across Brooklyn and The Bronx due to salted roads causing flare-ups. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiogFBVV95cUxQYzVkZXNTbVNNT2g4OVZ3LU9pZjBPb3JoVmY2ZXFLbnZjdkpreFpkWnN3cFE2S3lzVmUxRzVLTzdOWFNqelhyZXBILWtia1k0NGl5Z0ZXMmJVUTlWMHl3NFNJVTU0TjltUUJtckoyZ2Z6QjN6aHpJX1g2NVltVFR0UkJEVEpub1otSnUtam9iQ2czRzFyYlpDb1RmbkVkMldxYWc?oc=5)

[↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMihwFBVV95cUxQSENPQ0lsVlFHUFF5QmpQZEI2ckdXM1VyY3VYRjFXR2VTVXZwZ3Z3MEhUS2Z6WTlGcEcxWHo2Ri1YVnRXMDc2ZHBnOWRsVlVMc0xYVVRXM3k0djN5UFVQd01FaHZfbGlvRkZtNGR4c05YQ1h3R3ZsZHNuZXlJaGVRZXhGNXRhWlU?oc=5)
- NYC winter storm warning issued; heaviest snow expected soon. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
